mapper.select: select * from (select * from ${tableName} order by opdate desc) where rownum=1
mapper.update: update CBONDFUTURESEODPRICES set status = case when status = 1 then 0 when status = 0 then 1 end
mapper.insert: insert into CBONDFUTURESEODPRICES ( object_id, s_info_windcode, trade_dt, s_dq_presettle, s_dq_open, s_dq_high, s_dq_low, s_dq_close, s_dq_settle, s_dq_volume, s_dq_amount, s_dq_oi, s_dq_change, opdate, opmode, imp_date, imp_time, status ) values ( #{objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sInfoWindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tradeDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dDqPresettle,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqHigh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqLow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqClose,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqSettle,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqVolume,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqOi,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sDqChange,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{opdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{opmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{impDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{impTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into CBONDFUTURESEODPRICES ( object_id, s_info_windcode, trade_dt, s_dq_presettle, s_dq_open, s_dq_high, s_dq_low, s_dq_close, s_dq_settle, s_dq_volume, s_dq_amount, s_dq_oi, s_dq_change, opdate, opmode, imp_date, imp_time, status )
( select #{item.objectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sInfoWindcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tradeDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dDqPresettle,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqHigh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqLow,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqClose,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqSettle,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqVolume,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqAmount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqOi,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.sDqChange,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.opdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.opmode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.impDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.impTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER} from dual )
